title: How to Catch Heatran in Pokémon Black 2 and White 2

steps.title: Beat the Elite 4.
steps.content: Beat the Elite 4. You have to beat the Elite 4 and Champion before you can catch Heatran.

steps.title: Get the Magma Stone.
steps.content: Get the Magma Stone. The Magma Stone is located on a cliff on Route 18. You need a Pokémon with Surf to get there.

steps.title: Go to the Reversal Mountain cave.
steps.content: Go to the Reversal Mountain cave. Reversal Mountain is located east of Undella Town.

steps.title: From the entrance, go up, right into the next room, down, and right until you find a doctor trainer.
steps.content: From the entrance, go up, right into the next room, down, and right until you find a doctor trainer. There will be a room above him; go into it. If you have already beaten him, you can talk to him to have him heal your Pokémon.

steps.title: Go up to the stairs, and the Magma Stone will activate.
steps.content: Go up to the stairs, and the Magma Stone will activate. Heatran will appear; talk to it to battle it.
